Business Development Manager Job at SFO Consulting




        
    

        
        SFO Consulting is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Preferred Candidate: Female

About the Opportunity
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you a bold, results-driven business leader ready to make real impact across multiple industries?
	Join a fast-growing organization with thriving ventures in Learning & Development, Consulting, Non-Profit, and Food & Beverage, and play a key role in driving the next phase of business growth and expansion.
	This isn’t your typical business development role it’s an opportunity to build, scale, and lead with purpose and influence.


What You’ll Do


	Design and execute strategic growth plans that unlock new markets and drive profitability.
	Identify and close high-value business deals that strengthen brand positioning.
	Build and nurture strategic partnerships that create long-term impact.
	Collaborate across teams to deliver seamless business outcomes and achieve company objectives.
	Stay ahead of trends and translate market insights into actionable opportunities.


What You Bring


	8+ years of experience in Business Development, Strategy, or Sales.
	Proven success in driving revenue growth and market expansion.
	A strong professional network and exceptional negotiation skills.
	Entrepreneurial mindset with creativity and resilience.
	Outstanding communication and leadership presence.


Salary


	N700,000 - N900,000 per month. 


Why You’ll Love Working Here:


	Competitive salary.
	Direct exposure to multi-sector business leadership and strategy.
	A dynamic, growth-driven work culture that values innovation and initiative.
	Opportunity to shape multiple brands and build your professional legacy.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitmentinpoi@gmail.com and CC to: sfo.hrconsultant@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: If you’re a strategic doer and visionary thinker ready to take on your next big challenge, we’d love to meet you.

	We are seeking a detail-oriented and tech-savvy Accountant to join our consulting and implementation team. 	Document financial processes, controls, and posting procedures (SOPs).
	Provide financial insights and participate in budgeting and cost control reviews.

	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (ICAN/ACCA is an advantage).
